sys_ui_annotation.text:
Critical Label Groups:

  1. Critical label groups are configured on the PCE for each label type.
  2. Labels in a critical label group are not overwritten for a workload. The entire workload record is skipped.
  3. If critical label groups are not specified, any label on the PCE can be modified.

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update><sys_ui_section caption="Critical Label Groups" section_id="fef112b0dbd4ac901206fd641d96194d" sys_domain="global" table="x_illu2_illumio_illumio_pce_conf" version="3" view=""><sys_ui_annotation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><is_plain_text>false</is_plain_text><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-03-06 06:45:02</sys_created_on><sys_id>4ca8a34997700210b7daf896f053afb3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-03-06 06:45:02</sys_updated_on><text><html>
<head>
<style>
       ol {
           list-style-type: disc;
           margin-top: 1 em;
           margin-left: 0;
           margin-right: 0;
           padding-left: 40px;
       }

       p {
           padding-left: 20px;
       }
</style>
</head>
<body>
<p></p>
<p><b>Critical Label Groups:</b> </p>
<ol><li>Critical label groups are configured on the PCE for each label type.</li>
<li>Labels in a critical label group are not overwritten for a workload. The entire workload record is skipped.</li>
<li>If critical label groups are not specified, any label on the PCE can be modified.</li>
</ol>


</body>
</html></text><type display_value="Info Box Blue">753f88a80f930000b12e6903cfe01206</type></sys_ui_annotation><sys_ui_element
